Classes/BDLocationManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Stop Tempo Tracking

Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: timestamp
Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: The time at which this location was determined.

Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: latitude
Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: The latitude at which this location was determined.

Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: longitude
Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: The longitude at which this location was determined.

Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: bearing
Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: The bearing of the device at the latitude and longitude of the location.

Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: speed
Classes/BDLocationInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: The speed of the device at the latitude and longitude of the location.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: -initWithCLLocation:
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: Initialisation methods for to creation a location.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: accuracy
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The accuracy, in metres, to which this location is known. Sometimes referred to as the ‘horizontal accuracy’ or just ‘error’.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: altitudeAccuracy
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The altitude accuracy, in metres, to which this location is known. Sometimes referred to as the ‘vertical accuracy’ or just ‘error’.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: point
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The geographic location of this location, over the surface of the earth, independent of it’s altitude.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: altitude
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The altitude of this geographic location in metres.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: speed
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The speed of the device at the point of the location.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: bearing
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The bearing of the device at the point of the location.

Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.name: provider
Classes/BDLocation.html#/c:objc(cs)BDLoc.abstract: The location method provider of the device at the point of the location

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDFe.abstract: The name of this Fence that was entered into Canvas

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDFe.abstract: The description of this Fence that was entered into Canvas

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDFe.abstract: The description of this ID of the fence

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDFe.name: geometry
Classes/BDFenceInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDFe.abstract: The geometry of this Fence that was defined in Canvas

Classes/BDCircle.html#/c:objc(cs)BDCircl.name: center
Classes/BDCircle.html#/c:objc(cs)BDCircl.abstract: Center of this Circle as a @ref BDPoint in latitude/longitude coordinates.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -initWithNorth:west:south:east:
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: Initializes a BDBoundingBox with individual values for the four bounding edges, in degrees.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -initWithNorthEast:southWest:
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: Initializes a BDBoundingBox with @ref BDPoint values for two of the bounding corners.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -initWithCoordinateRegion:
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: Initializes a BDBoundingBox using a MapKit coordinate region.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -coordinateRegion
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the equivalent MapKit coordinate region representation of this rectangular region.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -west
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the longitudinal component of the South-West corner point of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -north
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: Returns the latitudinal component of the North-East corner point of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -east
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the longitudinal component of the North-East corner point of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -setSouth:
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: Sets the latitudinal component of the South-West corner point of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -south
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the latitudinal component of the South-West corner point of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -longitudeSpan
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the absolute difference between the East and West longitudes, in degrees.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -latitudeSpan
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns the absolute difference between the North and South latitudes, in degrees.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: northEast
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: The North-East corner of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: southWest
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: The South-West corner of this rectangular region

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.name: -vertices
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html#/c:objc(cs)BD.abstract: @returns An array of the corner @ref BDPoint “points” of this @ref BDBoundingBox, ordered: North, East, South, West.

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: name
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The name of this Beacon that was entered into Canvas

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: description
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The description of this Beacon that was entered into Canvas

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: proximityUuid
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The proximityUUID of this Beacon, as entered into Canvas

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: major
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The major identifier of this Beacon, as entered into Canvas

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: minor
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The minor identifier of this Beacon, as entered into Canvas

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: location
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: The approximate location of this Beacon, as entered into Canvas, or NULL if this Beacon has no fixed location.

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.name: geometry
Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html#/c:objc(cs)BDB.abstract: Returns a BDPoint representation of the approximate location of this Beacon, as entered into Canvas, or nil if this Beacon has no fixed location.

Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html.abstract: Information about a BLE Beacon, as defined in Canvas.

Classes/BDCircle.html.abstract: @brief A circular region on the Earth’s surface, defined by a center @ref BDPoint “point” and a radius, in meters.

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html.abstract: Information about a geofence, as defined in Canvas.

Classes/BDLineString.html.name: BDLineString

Classes/BDLocationManager.html.name: BDLocationManager
Classes/BDLocationManager.html.abstract: @brief Entry-point for your Application’s interaction with Point SDK.

Classes/BDPoint.html.name: BDPoint
Classes/BDPoint.html.abstract: @brief A geographic point expressed in latitude and longitude coordinates.

Classes/BDPolygon.html.name: BDPolygon
Classes/BDPolygon.html.abstract: @brief Arbitrary region on the Earth’s surface, comprised of two or more @ref BDPoint “points” connected by straight-line segments.

Classes/BDPolygonal.html.name: BDPolygonal
Classes/BDPolygonal.html.abstract: @brief Base-class for @ref BDGeometry “geometries” defined by an ordered series of @ref BDPoint “points”.

Classes/BDZoneExitEvent.html.abstract: Contains information about a Zone Exit Event

Classes/BDZoneInfo.html.abstract: Contains information about a Zone, including the set of BDFenceInfo “fences” that comprise it.
